<template>
  <!-- No changes to template section -->
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'StreamCheck',
  data() {
    return {
      // No changes to data section
    }
  },
  computed: {
    // No changes to computed section
  },
  created() {
    // No changes to created section
    
    // 添加事件监听
    this.$root.$on('reset-stream-list', () => {
      this.streamList = []  // 清空列表
      this.currentPage = 1  // 重置页码
      this.saveState()      // 保存空状态
    })
  },
  beforeDestroy() {
    // No changes to beforeDestroy section
    
    // 移除事件监听
    this.$root.$off('reset-stream-list')
  },
  methods: {
    // No changes to methods section
  },
  watch: {
    // No changes to watch section
  },
  // No changes to activated and deactivated sections
}
</script>

<style scoped>
/* No changes to style section */
</style>
